title: Can I do a lot of analysis on one field at the time of indexing?
description:
Hello


I have a question about index schemas.

1) Can I do various analysis on one field?
For example, you can analyze the 'title' field with multiple tokenizers, and merge the analysis into a single field.

2) You can collect multiple fields in one field using 'copyField' function. However, several fields have different data attributes (eg, category fields, text fields, etc.) _)
At this time, I would like to analyze each field differently.

Do you have these features in version 7.5? Is there any kind of shortcut to do these similar functions?

Thank you for your advice.

comments.author: Adrien Grand
comments.content: Please ask questions on the user list (https://lucene.apache.org/core/discussion.html#java-user-list-java-userluceneapacheorg) instead. If your question is about Solr (I see you mentioned copyField), then you would be more likely to get answers on the solr-user list (http://lucene.apache.org/solr/community.html#solr-user-list-solr-userluceneapacheorg).
